addressleaf.section:
Copy of my l
re
to my L Treasuro
r
Ma
r
29
A
p
1. 89.

page.lettertext:
Belgia 1589 pr
o
Aprillis To my L Treasurer
It is nowe written hither, that th'ennemy is in earnest parle w
th
those of
Gertrudenberge,
and hath gotten the possession of
those fortes, w
th
out the Towne w
ch
Conte Maurice
had
made: whoe is de
ted w
th
parte of his forces toward
Williamstatt
&
Tertoll,
whear the ennemyes co
m
inge is also
feared. It is further adv
r
tised out of
Brabante
by some
that are theare w
th
th'ennemye, & geive intelligence hither,
that thear is some practise towardes betweene
Schincke,
and
the ennemy; w
ch
is not signified w
th
any other circomstance.
Notw
th
standinge thease men heere promise him so little, and
then
fourme so slowly that w
ch
they promise, usinge him
every way veary hardly, as I doubte in th'end it will fall
heavely uppon them. The like is signified hither againste
Cap
t
Salisburye
, of
Bergen op Some
, that he hath some
intelligence w
th
th'ennemy: wheareof I have certified
S
r
Thomas Morgan
, and the Ca
p
theare, wishinge that he might
be removed untill he come hither in
son, and justifie his
cause: for that this
Consell of State
hath had continually a
vehemente suspition of his doinges, and will charge him,
as it seemeth, w
th
divers
ticularities./
